mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMOTIONS WHERE EMO_COMM_EVENT_NUM = #{eventNum} AND EMO_USERID = #{userid} ORDER BY EMO_COMMNUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMOTIONS VALUES (#{eventNum}, #{commNum}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(EMO_NUM), 0)+1 FROM EMOTIONS e), #{userid})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EMOTIONS WHERE EMO_COMM_EVENT_NUM = #{eventNum} AND EMO_COMMNUM = #{commNum} AND EMO_USERID = #{userid}
